description:
Kanda Yuu is one of two Second Exorcists successfully created during the Artificial Disciple Program carried out by the Chan and Epstein families nine years ago.
Kanda was originally an Accommodator and Exorcist of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order], but he was killed by an Akuma about thirty years before the start of the story. There was also a woman in his previous life whom he loved, a fellow Exorcist who died alongside him.
After their deaths, the bodies of Kanda and his lover were taken to http://anidb.net/ch32500 [Asian Branch], where their brains were harvested and implanted into new bodies as part of the Second Exorcist Program. About twenty years later, Kanda awoke in the Sixth Laboratory of the Asian Branch.
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.
name: Kanda Yuu (Kodomo Jidai)
